name: superbasic
description: An open-source IDE/runtime for the Small Basic programming language.
author: OmarTawfik

scripts.compiler-test-debug: node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --config compiler/tests/webpack.config.ts && node node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js dist/compiler/debug/tests.js
scripts.compiler-test-release: node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --config compiler/tests/webpack.config.ts --env.release && node node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js dist/compiler/release/tests.js
